mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.title AS title, t.content AS content, t.postdate AS postdate, t.poster AS poster, t.video AS video, t.del_flag AS delFlag FROM classes t WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classes ( id, title, content, postdate, poster, video, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{postdate}, #{poster}, #{video}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE classes
id = #{id},
title = #{title},

del_flag = #{delFlag}
